about_the_game:
Master long-range hunting with new precision scopes and a customizable reticle system designed for superior accuracy. Track and hunt game during the darkest hours of night with advanced night vision and gain more choice over your loadout with the new customizable reticle system and options.

This pack contains:

Angler 4-8x100 Night Vision Rifle Scope
Experience unparalleled clarity in darkness with the cutting-edge Angler Night Vision Rifle Scope, which features a wide 100 mm lens and modern white phosphor technology.


Odin 4-12x33 Rifle Scope
Change optics less often with the all-purpose Odin Rifle Scope, which boasts a magnification range of 4-12x, enabling you to seamlessly transition between close encounters and long-distance shots.


Hermes 3-7x33 Handgun/Shotgun Scope
Redefine the capabilities of your handguns and shotguns with the Hermes 3-7x Scope. This innovative scope isn’t just an upgrade from the usual 1-4x magnification - it also cuts down on your backpack weight.


Customizable Reticles
Gain more choice over your loadout with five new reticles: Duplex Center Cross, Mil Dot 02, Reticle Crosscut, Target Dot, and Chevron. You can customize each reticle with any of the game's scopes to suit your playstyle.
